definition: something believed to bring good luck, to induce into action by using one's charm
details:
noun
- something believed to bring good luck
= example: something believed to bring good luck
= synonyms: good luck charm
- attractiveness that interests or pleases or stimulates
= example: attractiveness that interests or pleases or stimulates
= synonyms: appeal
- in physics, one of the six flavors of quark
= synonyms: strangeness
- a verbal formula believed to have magical force
= example: a verbal formula believed to have magical force
= synonyms: spell, magic spell, magical spell
verb
- to induce into action by using one's charm
= example: to induce into action by using one's charm
= synonyms: influence
- to protect through supernatural powers or charms
- to attract
= example: to attract
= synonyms: entrance
- to control by magic spells, as by practicing witchcraft
= example: to control by magic spells, as by practicing witchcraft
= synonyms: becharm
